name: Bun Install Lock File
summary: A LOCKB file is a file that contains data for packages, package metadata , and each package's dependencies, installed by Bun, an all-in-one manager for TypeScript and JavaScript projects. Bun creates LOCKB files when a Bun user runs bun install to make future installs quicker and more convenient.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Visual Studio Code with the "bun.lockb" extension

macos.display_name: Microsoft Visual Studio Code with the "bun.lockb" extension

linux.display_name: Microsoft Visual Studio Code with the "bun.lockb" extension
